name: So Bad, It's Good Game Jam - Alien gone wrong
name_original: So Bad, It's Good Game Jam - Alien gone wrong
description:
A hand-crafted masterpiece of a fan-made game gone wrong. Horribly wrong.

Hello friend,

Think about your favorite old movie...a groundbreaking, amazing masterpiece of art, creativity, special effects.

Now, let's imagine someone took that amazing movie and massacred it, put it in a blender, left it to rot and then turned it into a low-budget fan-made video game.

What if I told you, that you can play ALIEN 1 on PC now! But don't get excited, it is a hand-crafted turture of a game, a Limited "SO BAD, IT'S GOOD" edition. Nothing creates more frustration than seeing your favorite movie being poorly converted into a game, right?!

Why is this game so unique?

  • low effort graphics
  • Simplisitc, but plenty of blood
  • Re-live iconic movie scenes from Alien like never before
  • Unnecessary complicated and counter-intuitive controls that are in place only to torture you
  • Just enough fun to keep you playing
  • An entire 1 man "devloper, artist, customer service, Community manager, programmer" team at YOUR disposal to offer NO support or patches whatsoever

Jokes aside, all assets (script, music, effects, characters, etc.) are done by myself, no third party assets were used - the way a game jam was intended to be :)

PS: There is a lengthy DevLog if you want to learn more about the process.
